name: ngx-datetime-picker
description: Date, DateTime & Time Picker components that uses native HTML5 components on mobile

scripts.demo: npm run build && cd demo && npm install && cp -fr ../dist/* node_modules/ngx-datetime-picker && ng serve
scripts.demo.build: npm run build && cd demo && npm install && cp -fr ../dist/* node_modules/ngx-datetimepicker/ && ng build
scripts.demo.run: npm run build && cd demo && npm install && cp -fr ../dist/* node_modules/ngx-datetimepicker/ && ng serve
